text: Televiziunea Română (68 de Ani Televiziunea Română) Internațional) (TVR) is the national television system of Romania. It is made up of many channels (important channels of TVR : TVR1, TVR2, TVR3, TVR Cultural, TVR Info, TVR Folclor and TVR Sport). It broadcasts most official and important international events. It started in the year 1956. ==References== ==Other websites== * * TVR official website * Six TVR journalists accuse censorship (Ziua, 8 December 2004) Category:1956 establishments in Europe Category:Television networks Category:20th-century establishments in Romania Category:Organizations based in Romania
title: Romanian Television
